include_directories( BEFORE "../" ${RFRAME_INCLUDE_DIRS} )

link_directories ( ${RFRAME_LINK_DIRS} )

include(nav_msgs_gencpp.cmake)


# create a shared library for these data classes
add_library(nav_msgs_gencpp SHARED ${NAV_MSGS_GENCPP_GEN_CPP} )
target_link_libraries(nav_msgs_gencpp ${RFRAME_LIBS_INTERNAL} ${RCS_LIBS} actionlib_msgs_gencpp geometry_msgs_gencpp std_msgs_gencpp std_srvs_gencpp )


# install library
install(TARGETS nav_msgs_gencpp DESTINATION lib COMPONENT nav_msgs_gencpp )

# on install, symlink to data library so utilties can search for "*DATA.so"
install(CODE "execute_process(COMMAND ln -s ${RFRAME_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/libnav_msgs_gencpp.so ${RFRAME_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/libnav_msgs_gencpp_DATA.so ERROR_VARIABLE linkError RESULT_VARIABLE linkResult)" )
